EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop_Q214.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop Webinar is tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
A Friendly Reminder
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar "Querying External Data Sources with Hadoop" tomorrow, July 15, 2014 at 9:00 AM PDT/5:00PM GMT+1.
Event details:
Date: Tuesday, July 15, 2014 Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco)/5:00PM GMT+1 (London) Event Number: 669 579 740 Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=669579740> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 669 579 740
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
